sentence: The  federal  government  suspended  sales  of  U.S.  savings  bonds  because  Congress  has  n't  lifted  the  ceiling  on  government  debt  .
sentence_level_graph:
(s1s / suspend-01
     :ARG0 (s1g4 / government-organization

                 :mod (s1f / federal))

                 :ARG1 (s1b / bond
                            :mod (s1s3 / savings)
                            :mod (s1c3 / country
                                       :name (s1n / name
                                                  :op1 "U.S.")
                                       :wiki "United_States")))
     :ARG1-of (s1c / cause-01
                   :ARG0 (s1l / lift-01
                              :ARG0 (s1g3 / government-organization
                                          :name (s1n2 / name
                                                      :op1 "Congress")
                                          :wiki "United_States_Congress")
                              :ARG1 (s1c4 / ceiling
                                          :prep-on (s1d / debt
                                                        :mod (s1g5 / government-organization
                                                                   :ARG0-of (s1g2 / govern-01))))
                              :polarity -)))

sentence: Until  Congress  acts  ,  the  government  has  n't  any  authority  to  issue  new  debt  obligations  of  any  kind  ,  the  Treasury  said  .
sentence_level_graph:
(s2s / say-01
     :ARG0 (s2g3 / government-organization
                 :name (s2t / name
                            :op1 "Treasury")
                 :wiki "United_States_Department_of_the_Treasury")
     :ARG1 (s2a / authorize-01

                           :ARG0 (s2g4 / government-organization
                                       :ARG0-of (s2g / govern-01))
                           :ARG1 (s2o2 / obligation
                                       :mod (s2d / debt)
                                       :ARG1-of (s2n / new-01)
                                       :mod (s2k / kind
                                                 :mod (s2a3 / any))))
                :ARG2 s2g4
                :temporal (s2u / until
                               :op1 (s2a2 / act-02
                                          :ARG0 (s2g2 / government-organization
                                                      :name (s2c / name
                                                                 :op1 "Congress")
                                                      :wiki "United_States_Congress")))
                :polarity -))

sentence: The  government  's  borrowing  authority  dropped  at  midnight  Tuesday  to  $  2.80  trillion  from  $  2.87  trillion  .

(s3d4 / drop-01

sentence: Legislation  to  lift  the  debt  ceiling  is  ensnarled  in  the  fight  over  cutting  capital  -  gains  taxes  .
sentence_level_graph:
(s4e / ensnarl-01
     :ARG1 (s4l / legislate-01
                :ARG1 (s4l2 / lift-01

                                                                  :ARG1-of (s4g3 / gain-02
                                                                                 :mod (s4c5 / capital))))))))

sentence: The  House  has  voted  to  raise  the  ceiling  to  $  3.1  trillion  ,  but  the  Senate  is  n't  expected  to  act  until  next  week  at  the  earliest  .
sentence_level_graph:
(s5c2 / contrast-91
      :ARG1 (s5v / vote-01
                 :ARG0 (s5g / government-organization
                            :name (s5n / name

sentence: The  Treasury  said  the  U.S.  will  default  on  Nov.  9  if  Congress  does  n't  act  by  then  .

     :ARG0 (s6g / government-organization
